title: Research Design for Analyzing Online Learning Effectiveness and Educational Impact

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Online Educational Environments and Research Methodologies
context.additional_context: Participation by in-service professionals with educational leadership experience to strengthen social-sector job competencies.

learning_goals: Design and validate survey instruments to evaluate online learning effectiveness
Propose online learning improvement strategies based on educational impact analysis results
Write a report analyzing differences in online learning perceptions according to career levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
